price: Wagyegye ada mu wͻ mpa anaa ahennwa a emu kuntu no yε kyeme ntoma a yɛadi mu adwini a ԑyԑ fԑ so. Aheman no mmienu no mu nnuaba no bεn (wͻn).
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
